    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Origine du pétrole et du gaz</string>
            <string language="en">Origin of oil and gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursprung des Öls und des Gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Origem do óleo e do gás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Origine di petrolio e di gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προέλευση του πετρελαίου και αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Origen del aceite y del gas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">C'est la première sur quatre illustrations montrant la  formation de pétrole et de gaz sous terre. Ici, un bateau fore dans les roches pour obtenir le pétrole ou le gaz  emprisonné sous lui.</string>
            <string language="en">This is first of four illustrations showing the formation of oil and gas underground. Here, a ship drills down into the rocks to obtain the oil or gas trapped under it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">forant</string>
            <string language="en">drilling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">combustible fossile</string>
            <string language="en">fossil fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fossiles</string>
            <string language="en">fossils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">gaz</string>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pétrole</string>
            <string language="en">oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roche</string>
            <string language="en">rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mer</string>
            <string language="en">sea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">bateau</string>
            <string language="en">ship</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">piège</string>
            <string language="en">trap</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">souterrain</string>
            <string language="en">underground</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist erstes von vier Abbildungen, welche 
die Anordnung von Öl- und Gasuntergrund zeigen. Hier bohrt ein 
Schiff unten in die Felsen, um das Öl oder das Gas zu erhalten, die 
unter ihm eingeschlossen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é primeiro de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram a formação do subterrâneo do óleo e do gás. Aqui, 
um navio perfura para baixo nas rochas para obter o óleo ou o gás 
prendido sob ele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una prima di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano la formazione del underground del gas e del petrolio. 
Qui, una nave perfora giù nelle roccie per ottenere il petrolio
o il gas bloccato sotto esso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι πρώτη τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν το σχηματισμό του πετρελαίου και αέριο υπόγεια. 
Εδώ, ένα σκάφος τρυπά με τρυπάνι κάτω στους βράχους για 
να λάβει το πετρέλαιο ή αέριο παγιδεμμένος κάτω από το.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es primer de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran la formación del subterráneo del aceite y del gas. 
Aquí, una nave perfora abajo en las rocas para obtener el 
aceite o el gas atrapado bajo ella.</string>
          </description>
